DOC.brief_title: Culturally-Tailored HIV Risk Reduction African-American MSM
DOC.detailed_description: The HCT-plus intervention consist HCT-only intervention , well 8 small group intervention session focus HIV risk reduction . Small group consist 10 men meet once-a-week 8 consecutive week . Each meeting last approximately 2 hour . In small group session , staff work men reassess HIV risk behavior , re-prioritize goal appropriate , provide motivational support risk reduction accomplishment . Participants ask discuss way successfully avoid HIV risk behavior since previous session , well discuss situation find difficult avoid risk . Staff reinforce successful risk avoidance , problem-solve men overcome barrier risk reduction .
DOC.criteria: reside Milwaukee county ; least 18 year age ; selfidentify male ; selfidentify Black AfricanAmerican ; provide inform consent ; report unprotected anal sex man past 3 month ; report least two sexual partner unprotected anal vaginal sex past 3 month ; willing test HIV use rapid oral fluid procedure willing provide evidence HIV seropositivity Under 18 year age , involvement HIV prevention study currently past 6 month , Participation pilot phase
